Peregrine falcon can reach speeds over 3: Peregrine falcon top speed Can peregrine falcons fly over 386 mph?

A large, crow-sized falcon, it has a blue-grey back, barred white underparts, and a black head. The peregrine is renowned for its speed. It can reach over 320 km/h (200 mph) during its characteristic hunting stoop (high-speed dive), making it the fastest animal on the planet.
Peregrine falcon top speed Can peregrine falcons fly over 386 mph?

Peregrine Falcon – Top Speed: 240 mph (386 kph) The peregrine falcon holds the title of the fastest animal in the world. During its hunting stoop (high-speed dive), it ascends to great heights before plummeting toward its prey at speeds that can exceed 240 mph (386 kph).
